tool.help:
================================== MTBLS520 Eco-Metabolomics workflow ==================================
This is the computational workflow to study the seasonal variation of secondary metabolites in nine different bryophytes.
Module | Preparations |
Description | Preparations and preprocessing of parameters |
----- Input -----
Polarity | The polarity of the acquition mode, defaults to positive. Allowed values: positive or negative. |
RAW mzML files | Dataset collection raw mzML files |
Analytical metadata | ISA-Tab Assay file |
Sample metadata | ISA-Tab Sample file |
------ Output ------
Preprocess Rdata | Rdata file. Please connect this Rdata file to the module import maf. |
---------------------------------------------------
